text:
Sen. Elizabeth Warren is urging the CDC to use its authority to implement masks requirements in regions around the US with surging coronavirus cases.

"We are seeing a massive surge of COVID-19 cases in nearly 50 states and territories across the country."
https://t.co/MQ61LVjqnz

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
